item.title: World Building Guide
item.description: Ancient Languages: German as the language of old academia World Name: Ausfallen Races: Humans: The most common, making up about 50% of the area Elves: Have long maintained some minor ...

item.title: Orcs
item.description: Pig like in appearance, orcs are often considered both stubborn and loyal. Orcs as a whole are distrustful of magic, believing it lead to the fall of their once great empire, of which there is now only oral tradition.

item.title: Humans
item.description: The most common, making up about 50% of the area. They come from diverse backgrounds and cultures. In the Ausfallen region humans, like many others, are trying to establish themselves.

item.title: Goblins
item.description: Goblins of this region often view gold as akin to divinity, to be used primarily in worship. Some goblins are happy maintain the gold they already have while others see it as their duty to ‚Äúreclaim‚Äù all gold for their faith.

item.title: Dragonborn
item.description: Believe themselves to be descendants of dragons, or at least cousins .

item.title: Elves
item.description: Have long maintained some minor magical prowess, which has left many to be suspicious of them.
